title: Authorizes the development and implementation of an online tracking system for loans and grants
summary: Authorizes the development and implementation of an online tracking system for loans and grants by the department of economic development, in conjunction with the empire state development corporation and the urban development corporation; further provides for an email notification system for individuals and companies for electronic notification of grants, loans, policy changes and other general information.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2036

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 13, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. REILICH, KOLB, CONTE, SAYWARD, McKEVITT, DUPREY
         -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of  A.  BARCLAY,  CROUCH,  FINCH,  HAWLEY,
         P. LOPEZ,  J. MILLER,  OAKS,  TEDISCO -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Economic Development, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to  developing
         an online tracking system for loans and grants

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 47 of section 100 of the  economic  development
    2  law,  as  renumbered  by  chapter 427 of the laws of 2008, is renumbered
    3  subdivision 48 and a new subdivision 47 is added to read as follows:
    4    47. TO DEVELOP AND IMPLEMENT, IN CONJUNCTION  WITH  THE  EMPIRE  STATE
    5  DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION AND THE URBAN DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION, AN ONLINE
    6  TRACKING  SYSTEM  FOR LOANS AND GRANTS ADMINISTERED THROUGH EACH RESPEC-
    7  TIVE ENTITY. AN EMAIL NOTIFICATION SYSTEM THROUGH WHICH INDIVIDUALS  AND
    8  COMPANIES  CAN  SIGN  UP  FOR  ELECTRONIC NOTIFICATION OF GRANTS, LOANS,
    9  POLICY CHANGES AND OTHER GENERAL INFORMATION SHALL ALSO BE MADE  READILY
   10  AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03603-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to developing an online tracking system for loans and grants
